channel.title: Moparscape
channel.description:
This community has about 9 moderators online at the moment, none of which do their job to the littlest extent. The members of this community are amongst the rudest people, for those who know none of which they speak. I found it quite amusing, to see people fail to know about Devolution's history and present, to which they can post assuming I am pretending to be Josh, what a joke this place is. An SMF forums with a terribly boring server, I see Mopar has come no further than the begging. The server development section appears to be the home of those who are looking to own a server, they simply post that they need the following - - a client "coder" - a server "coder" - A forums developer - host.
how much more can you ask for? a blowjob?
Thanks so much Moparscape, for proving such a valid point.
It was said to me that Mopar was the worst community, and it is common to see on real communities, leechers posting and being told to "go back to mopar" or see "this belongs on mopar /facepalm"
What a joke.

how much more can you ask for? a blowjob?[/quote]

item.title: Moparscape
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“T3arful, post:37, topic:331882”]My original motive was questioning as to why they’ve started talking crap about another community when this one is far from being any better.

Do you believe in a cumulative? Over time the amount of threads posted obviously builds up for not only previous reference, but also as resource.

5512 pages of help threads, out of those, how many do you think are used as a reference to a problem someone has? Granted that there are threads from 2006, sounds like a lot of ‘resources’ to me.
The same problem is posted over and over again, so that obviously shows they aren’t used as a reference by a majority.
Why do you think they changed how the Tutorials section worked (Tutorials having to be approved)?
The same old crap was posted over and over again (until they sorted it out, although it is still the same case for rs2 client hacking) if people used previous posts as a reference, why has all the same stuff being posted and why was the tutorial section changed?

Any community that has staff that completely refurbishes their boards due to “garbage” is a joke.

That is exactly what happened here!
The Server Tutorial section was refurbished and only the things deemed useful were not deleted. Hence why there is only 13 pages of tutorials.

Its funny because without this community there wouldn’t be any others.

Funny because without Kaitnieks this community probably wouldn’t exist.

Edit: Also Frell;
According to whois.net
Moparscape.org Created On:03-Jun-2006 03:45:38
Runestatus.net Creation Date: 15-dec-2005
Moparisthebest.com Creation Date: 12-jan-2006

Runestatus later turned into Rune Server. ;)[/quote]I agree on the fact that the dead topics aren’t used as they should be, but the tutorial section was kept under that condition because it’s for strict learning purposes. Tutorials can be removed for shit because you wouldn’t want people learning shit conventions, methods, C&P, etc. There’s no reason to remove questions, discussions, references, etc., because you can use them later.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

oops.

Either way, this community has many people from kaitnieks on it. And WL wrote the first server during that time.

Do you believe in a cumulative? Over time the amount of threads posted obviously builds up for not only previous reference, but also as resource.

The same problem is posted over and over again, so that obviously shows they aren’t used as a reference by a majority.
Why do you think they changed how the Tutorials section worked (Tutorials having to be approved)?

The Reaper X:

Any community that has staff that completely refurbishes their boards due to “garbage” is a joke.

That is exactly what happened here!
The Server Tutorial section was refurbished and only the things deemed useful were not deleted. Hence why there is only 13 pages of tutorials.

Frell:

Its funny because without this community there wouldn’t be any others.

Funny because without Kaitnieks this community probably wouldn’t exist.

Edit: Also Frell;
According to whois.net
Moparscape.org Created On:03-Jun-2006 03:45:38
Runestatus.net Creation Date: 15-dec-2005
Moparisthebest.com Creation Date: 12-jan-2006

Runestatus later turned into Rune Server.

item.title: Moparscape
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

I found this somewhere on the internet, I think it was google & i saw this when i typed “lolbanned parody”

Seriously you joined the community and posted like 5 tutorials in one day. Now you b***h that people are flaming you. You have no life or don’t understand the word “LEAVE ALREADY”. Instead you post another thread “LAST POST” and b*h about mopar. Mopar is where everyone starts, Everyone here knows what they talk about. What you do is like downloading a server and re-releasing it named “LOLBanned V1.0 = PRO SERVER = CODED FOR 4 MONTHS”
Then type a bunch of bullst and give a download link. Seriously go kill your self or leave Mopar.

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“T3arful, post:33, topic:331882”][quote author=ziplock link=topic=428264.msg3144936#msg3144936 date=1267971416]
Yes because if the moderator’s got hacked by some dumbasses and deleted boards then it would be doing us a favor. /facepalm
[/quote]
Quite clearly you didn’t understand what I meant by ‘doing you a favour’. By deleting everything, all the shit would be gone. Understand?[/quote]Do you believe in a cumulative? Over time the amount of threads posted obviously builds up for not only previous reference, but also as resource. Any community that has staff that completely refurbishes their boards due to “garbage” is a joke. What are they doing? Making space for more garbage yet to come? They’re contradicting themselves.

[quote=“T3arful, post:30, topic:331882”][quote author=jmood128 link=topic=428264.msg3144874#msg3144874 date=1267963687]
Also there are useful things on this site, just because your a moparscaper only doesn’t mean there’s nothing useful.
[/quote]
This site as in moparisthebest.com? I don’t think so. Amount of crap things > Amount of useful things.[/quote]As if every other community’s crap is < their useful…?

[quote=“T3arful, post:28, topic:331882”]Also as to why everyone on this thread has raged at this kid is beyond me.[/quote]Because he’s bitching about this community as if the whole community has attacked him. He acts as if his fuck-up has opened his eyes to some true form of moparscape, revealing that it’s a load of garbage. There’s not much better out there; anyone could create a thread of the same relevance on any other forum.

@OP, there have been countless amounts of threads such as yours. Perhaps you have a sense of achievement, hoping that the rest of the community is going to see a new light. If this is the case, I’d like to inform you that there is no hope for changing what is mopar.

edit: By the way, staff discussion is overrated.

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

I actually laughed at the stupidity in this thread.

LOLBanned:

This community has about 9 moderators online at the moment, none of which do their job to the littlest extent.

Only people who are mods have blue names, red names, or yellow names (and a bulbasaur). Not every idiot with a colored name is a mod.

LOLBanned:

The members of this community are amongst the rudest people, for those who know none of which they speak.

There are a lot more communities, that would have people that are much ruder if it wasn’t for the communist way rules imposed on them. I mean all forums have rules like that, but look how more lenient than other forms we are with it.

LOLBanned:

I found it quite amusing, to see people fail to know about Devolution’s history and present, to which they can post assuming I am pretending to be Josh, what a joke this place is.

<c|p>BAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAAHAHHAAHAHHAHAHAHAHAAHAHAHAHAAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAAHA</c|p> You obviously know an extremely small fraction of RSPS history and have no room to bash others about their knowledge…

LOLBanned:

An SMF forums with a terribly boring server, I see Mopar has come no further than the begging.

What is this I don’t even… Mopar really hasn’t come far. That is why he release Moparscape 4, which is more advanced than anything you could come up with, or any of the other sites you seem to love so much.

[quote=“LOLBanned, post:1, topic:331882”]It was said to me that Mopar was the worst community, and it is common to see on real communities, leechers posting and being told to “go back to mopar” or see “this belongs on mopar /facepalm”

What a joke.[/quote]
This belongs on mopar /facepalm…

tl;dr: You’re an idiot, you have no idea what you’re talking about, and your just pissed off that we caught you leeching (from another topic on this forums?), and told you to gtfo.

tl;dr that: gtfo…

Read full topic

Nobody hacks and deletes shit on this community because if they did, they would be doing it a favour.

Also as to why everyone on this thread has raged at this kid is beyond me.[/quote]

Yes because if the moderator’s got hacked by some dumbasses and deleted boards then it would be doing us a favor. /facepalm

Were are raging because he is crying over being called a noob. He needs to get over it as we all went through it, but hes just a 11 year old that’s not mature enough to handle an insult.

item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

LOLBanned:

I’m just on about ol shit because I’m pissed at how I am being called a leecher, on here of all places [I am never called a leecher on google,runepalace,or google] This community hasn’t seen whats been going on elsewhere, they they think they know everything.

Maybe your name isn’t fucking retarded on other sites so they don’t call you names.

Also, I and many others, know far more about the history of RSPS then you do, probably because we were there through it all.

OP: fuck off
